content: dana is a 10-inch square made with stylecraft special double knit and a 4mm hook approx 130 meters/ 142 yards of yarn needed 44 grams if you wish to use an aran/worsted weight yarn you will need approx 25% more yarn and it will give you a 12 inch square you can follow a 2 3 5 or 7 colour scheme these are listed in the separate pdf as well as the yarn amounts used per round the instructions for 1 colour can be found at page 9 of this pdf the colours used for the photo tutorial are white and pistachio happy hooking
